text:
Alright, take care. I know it's a sudden
meeting tomorrow, but I'm counting on you.
Well, I'd appreciate it if everyone could hear it together.

... My only concern,
is whether it's harmful or not.

Oh... Well, it's not harmful.
It's actually something good.

It's really good, for everyone! I want you to
see it as the result of your hard work during rehearsals.

... Then I'll make a judgment after hearing the details.
Good job today.

────……
"Got your first job", that's written all over your face.
